text: Beethoven's 2nd is a 1993 American family comedy movie. Directed by Rod Daniel and written by Len Blum, it is the sequel to the 1992 movie Beethoven, second installment in the Beethoven movie series and the last to be released theatrically. Charles Grodin, Bonnie Hunt, Nicholle Tom, Christopher Castile and Sarah Rose Karr reprised their roles with Debi Mazar and Chris Penn joining the cast as the antagonists. Initially, no sequel was planned, but it was produced after the unexpected financial success of the previous movie. == Other websites == * * * * Category:1993 comedy movies Category:1993 movies Category:American family comedy movies Category:1990s English-language movies Category:Movies about dogs Category:Movies about animal cruelty Category:Movies about families
title: Beethoven's 2nd
